Juana is a great woman of 39 years of age. She is single and has great aspirations in life. Juana states that thanks to her loan, she was able to invest in her business of making traditional wristbands. Fortunately, she managed to stock many clients with her product, and her income improved.

Juana, with the desire to continue prospering with her business, has decided to apply for a new loan to purchase primary materials for making traditional weavings. With the loan she will buy silk thread, German embroidery thread, and embroidery floss. With this investment, she hopes to better satisfy her customers and with the earnings to buy her own house.

loans.use: to buy silk thread, German embroidery thread and embroidery floss.

loans.name: Sule

texts.en:
Sule is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating of a good harvest this season, Sule has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. Before joining Babban Gona, Sule would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs.

With the help of this loan, Sule can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. As a Babban Gona member, Sule will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000/ha. is thankful that he now has the opportunity to to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest .

loans.name: Eli

texts.es:
Eli con 29 años de edad ,de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y su menor hijo, en el distrito de Callayuc,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Eli se dedica a la cría y engorde de aves de corral,con una experiencia en el rubro hace 04 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de polluelos, engordarlos y luego venderlos. De esta manera podrá engordarlos y luego venderlos.Obteniendo mayores ganancias.

Eli es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.Ha manejado 05 créditos los cuáles los a cancelado de forma puntual.
texts.en: Eli is 29 years old. He lives with his domestic partner and their young son in the district of Callayuc, province of Cutervo, department of Cajamarca, in Peru. The inhabitants of this area work mainly in agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry. He works raising and fattening poultry and has 4 years of experience in this business. He is requesting a loan to buy chicks to fatten and then sell. This way he will be able to fatten them and then sell, earning more income. Eli is a recurrent member of Edpyme Alternativa. He has managed 5 credits which he has paid on time.

loans.use: to buy chicks to fatten and then sell.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos, de 55 años de edad, culmino sus estudios hasta noveno grado, vive solo y no tiene ningún hijo.

Carlos, es muy emprendedor y trabajador, tiene un taller de electrónica desde hace tres años.

Carlos, necesita el préstamo para ampliar su taller y comprar herramientas que necesita para trabajar y para contratar más trabajadores. 

Su sueño de Carlos, es que su negocio pueda seguir estable y que genere los ingresos necesarios para su sostenibilidad.
texts.en:
Carlos, at the age of 55, finished school through ninth grade. He lives alone and has no children.

Carlos is very entrepreneurial and hard-working. He has had an electronics workshop for three years. Carlos needs the loan to expand his workshop, buy tools that he needs to work, and hire more workers.

Carlos' dream is for his business to continue to be stable and to generate the income necessary for its sustainability.

loans.use: to expand his workshop, buy tools that he needs, and hire more workers.

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en: With the help of her husband, Virgie makes charcoal to provide for their children. Aside from this, she also sell bananas. Charcoal in the Philippines is mainly used for cooking, like a firewood. It is also used to make barbecue and to grill fish or meat. There is a high demand for this product. Virgie is asking a loan to buy more wood that she can process into a charcoal and also to buy bananas that she can sell. This way, she can expect a better revenue with the increase in her production. She only wish that her four children will be able to finish their studies in the future out of the income generated from these businesses.

loans.use: to buy wood for charcoal and bananas.

loans.name: Ghinwa

texts.en:
Ghinwa is 23-year-old single lady who has been working in a fabric and curtains selling shop for three years.

She is studying Accounting and is working hard to graduate with an excellent degree. Ghinwa is working hard to pay the requested university tuition fees.
She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to pay for her accounting University degree tuition fees. Ghinwa hopes to graduate soon and start her own business.

loans.use: to pay for her university degree tuition fees in Accountancy

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en: Mercedita is 38 years old and lives a simple life with her family in Tubigon, Bohol. She is married with two children; ages 21 and 17 years old. To earn a living and to provide the needs of their children, Mercedita runs a small sari-sari (varieties) store inside their house with the help of her husband. They are doing this proficiently for 20 years. In the future, Mercedita wants to improve her store and make it more profitable. With this, she is asking a bigger amount of loans for store repair.

loans.use: for store repair

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a hardworking woman whose main source of income is selling fresh fish. She is married and has five children. One of her child is still attending school. Her husband is a fisherman. She has been engaged in fish vending for many years now.

Norma would like to avail the loan to buy fishing net, foam (for fish storage) and ice. In that way, she could improve her earnings and continue seek ways on how to become more sustainable. She could now able to settle her obligation and handle her finances.

Norma has successfully paid back her previous loan in full and now she is requesting a new loan to further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, foam (for fish storage) and ice

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en: Lourdes is a 62-year-old woman from Baybay, Leyte. She is married and has four adult children. She works hard alone for financial stability. Thus, she runs a sari-sari store (general store) business for six years. Lourdes is asking an amount of loans to help her enhance her earnings. She is in need of PHP15000 to buy assorted commodities such as soft drinks, drinking liquor, canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, chips, candies, biscuits, chocolate bars, sugar, powdered chocolate drinks and juice. In the future, she wishes to have enough capital to operate her business continuously.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, drinking liquor, canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, chips, candies, biscuits, chocolate bars, sugar, powdered chocolate drinks and juice

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Loreta is a fish vendor. She sells fish to the community of Baybay, Leyte to earn a living. Loreta is working hard to sustain every day. Thus, she is working alone for a living since her husband already passed away. She has five adult children and have a family in their own. And this is the reason why she is asking for a loan. She needs the amount for additional capital to run her business for sustainability. She will use the money to buy more fish to sell that will help her enhance her earnings.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a Kiva borrower. She has 2 children. She describes herself to be committed. She operates a retail business where she sells vegetables and fruits. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her primary customers are locals. She will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy more stock of vegetables and fruits. She hopes that in the future, she will have increased profits. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna from Vanadzor city of Lori region greatly thanks for her first Kiva deal and would like to have one more Kiva partnership. Now she lives alone since her daughter is already married and she lives with her family. Susanna is still in her clothes trading business at the city’s wholesale market. At the rented stall she sells men and women clothing and shoes. Being already 20 years in this business Susanna is already skilled in the right choice of the clothes fashion, its quality and the colors that of greater demand in the season.

This time this Kiva loan of 400.000 Armenian drams Susanna asks as she wants to buy a computer and also to attend accounting courses in order to rule her accountancy herself on this way reducing her expenses of hiring specialist for that work.

loans.use: to buy a computer and also to attend accounting courses in order to rule her accountancy herself on this way reducing her expenses of hiring specialist for that work.

loans.name: Rina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rina, de 48 años de edad, no tiene hijos, solamente estudio primer grado, ella posee su propio negocio desde hace tres años, con ayuda de su esposo, el cual consiste en un pequeño cafetin.

Rina, necesita el crédito para comprar productos como golosinas, bebidas, pan, entre otros para su cafetín y así poder obtener aún más ganancias.

El sueño de Rina, es poder mejorar su vivienda y mejorar la situación economica de su familia.
texts.en:
Rina is 48 years old, does not have children, and only attended school until the first grade. She has had her own business for three years, with help from her husband, which consists of a small café.

Rina needs the loan in order to buy products like candy, drinks, and bread among other items for her small café and to get even more profit.

Rina's dream is to be able to improve her house and to improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy products like candy, drinks, and bread among other items for her small café.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es:
Dora, de 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo se dedica a la pesca artesanal y a la vez comercializa el pescado y sus hijos están estudiando.

Dora, se dedica a la venta de ropa en los cantones cercanos.

Dora, necesita el préstamo para comprar ropa para su negocio, porque se aproxima la temporada de fin de año y quiere estar preparada para vender aún más.

Su sueño es, que su negocio prospere más y que sus hijos puedan culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Dora is 31 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband earns a living in small scale fishing and at the same time selling the fish. Her children are studying.

Dora earns a living selling clothes in nearby cantons.

Dora needs the loan in order to buy clothing for her business because it is close to the end-of-year season and she wants to be prepared to sell even more.

Her dream is that her business may thrive more and that her children may finish her studies.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her business.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en: Farzana  is a 38 years old, married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband, who is a van driver by profession. He drives in the main city and makes enough income to cover all the expenses of his family. He wants to change the van's engine, as it is causing a lot of pollution and is consuming too much oil for its work. That is why Farzana has requested for a  Murabaha loan of 40000 PKR for her husband to buy a new engine of a van to provide better facilities to his customers. Farzana  is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for a van to provide better facilities to customers.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is a married woman. She has 1 child. She operates a retail business where she sells cosmetics and beauty products. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in a strategic place and her primary customers are ladies. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. She will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy more stock of cosmetics and other beauty products. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to puchase additional stock

loans.use: to buy more stock of cosmetics and other beauty products

loans.name: Rozina

texts.en:
Rozina is 43 years old, married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. Her husband (also shown in the photo) assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over the time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet the expenses of their 9 children.

Currently, she requested a Murabaha loan of 30000 PKR to purchase more grocery items including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea to cater maximum customers for generating healthier source of income. She is positive about her future earnings and will spend the part of her income on buying more items for her store.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea to cater maximum customers for generating healthier source of income

loans.name: Eunice Adorkor

texts.en:
Eunice is pursuing a two year program in Management Studies at the Methodist University College. The loan is to help pay for his tuition fees.
Her chosen profession interests her because it teaches one how to be in leadership position as well as sustaining your business and steps to growing the business wherever you go. Great people with humble beginnings push her to achieving greater heights in life because despite the obstacles they encountered, they worked hard to reach their goals. She sees herself managing an investment company in future.
Without this loan opportunity she would have deferred her course to next year.
“Ghana is blessed with rich minerals so investing in our country would help create more job opportunities for youth”.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fees in Management Studies

loans.name: Tomas Mateo

texts.es:
Tomas es un hombre de 23 años de edad, es casado con una familia de 2 hijos de las edades entre 1 y 3 años, está linda familia vive en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Tomas trabaja como piloto de taxi, con esta labor el genera sus ingresos y  a su familia ha logrado sacar adelante, el lleva 5 años de edad de trabajar en esta actividad, pero mejorar sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de güipiles.
Tomas  con el afán de tener un lugar donde poder construir su casa propia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para poder adquirir un terreno de media cuerda, esto con el fin de darle a su familia muy pronto su casa propia. Su gran sueño es contar con una vivienda y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Tomas is a man of 23 years of age. He is married, with a family of two children, ages 1 and 3. This beautiful family lives in a community of Chichicastenango.

Tomas works as a taxi driver. With this work, he generates his income, and he is managing to raise his family. He has been doing this work for five years, but to improve his income, he buys and sells huipiles [traditional blouses].

With the desire to have a place to build his own house, Tomas has decided to apply for a loan to be able to acquire a plot of land, with the goal of giving his family their own house very soon. His great dream is to have a house and to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for construction.

loans.name: Nandilyn

texts.en: Filipino people really loved street food, that is, food that are sold on the street. Nadilyn made a business out of this. Two of the most favorite foods are fish balls and tempura (battered and deep-fried vegetables, seafood). They are usually fried and skewered and dip in sweet and hot sauce. Nandilyn needs an additional capital through a loan from CEVI to continue expanding her business. She will use her loan to buy more tempura and fish balls. Nandilyn will then be able to continue her business with the goal of increasing her profits to help her husband and raise her three-year-old son well.

loans.use: to buy tempura and fish balls

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 38-year-old woman from Catigbian, Bohol. She is married with three children ages eleven, four and three years old. Her husband is a tricycle (a motorcycle with a covered sidecar that seats anywhere from one passenger to as many as the driver will allow) driver while Juliet successfully starts a new business; she raises pigs. Thus, she needs an amount to finance for feed. Aside from this, Juliet needs an amount to repair her karaoke machine. Definitely, she is engaged in other business opportunities for a living. In the future, Juliet is aiming for business improvement to have a sustainable means of living.

loans.use: to buy feed; and to repair her karaoke machine

loans.name: Kingroll

texts.en: Kingroll is a 38-year-old man from Tubigon, Bohol. He is married and has eleven-year-old son. He and his wife earn a living by doing the sari-sari (varieties) store business. They have been doing this for six years. Aside from this, Kingroll runs their farm. Thus, he works hard to enhance their livelihood and provide the needs of their family. His goal is to improve their business. To do this, he is asking for a loan for additional capital to buy grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, toiletries, laundry soap, chips, biscuits, bread, candies, sugar, coffee and soft drinks

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, toiletries, laundry soap, chips, biscuits, bread, candies, sugar, coffee and soft drinks

loans.name: Grupo Los Lideres De Chutiestancia Group

texts.es:
Anastasia es una gran mujer de 27 años de edad, con una familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 1 y 5 años de edad, esta familia vive en una comunidad de San Andrés Semetabaj.
Anastasia trabaja comprando y vendiendo güipiles típicos desde hace 15 años de edad, ella vende en el mercado de su comunidad y en los lugares circunvecinos de su pueblo natal. Ella gracias al liderazgo que posee, un grupo de mujeres la ha elegido como representante del grupo  denominado Los Líderes de Chutiestancia por esa razón ella solicita un crédito para invertirlo en su negocio de ropa típica, ella comprar güipiles, fajas y cortes. Sus aspiraciones en la vida es fortalecer su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Anastasia is a great woman at 27 years old, with a family of two children aged 1 and 5 years old. The family lives in a community of San Andrés Semetabaj.

Anastasia has worked buying and selling traditional güipiles [woven blouses] since she was 15 years old. She sells in the market in her community and in the places surrounding her hometown.

Thanks to the leadership she possesses, a group of women has elected her as the representative of the group named Los Líderes de Chutiestancia. For this reason she is requesting a loan in order to invest in her traditional clothing business; she will buy güipiles, belts, and skirts. Her aspirations in life are to strengthen her business and to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing like güipiles [woven blouses], belts, and skirts.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.en: Fidel owns a Sari-sari store that is attached to his home. His store almost looked like a balcony of his house. He just started this business five months ago. He is asking a loan to expand his business to include trendy clothes,  canned sardines,  beef loaf, shampoo, bath soap, milk, coffee, sugar, meat, hot dogs and seasoning to also start selling barbecued meat. At the moment, his priority is to increase his inventory level so he can also gain more customers from Valencia, Bohol where he lives with his wife.

loans.use: to buy trendy clothes,  canned sardines,  beef loaf, shampoo, bath soap, milk, coffee, sugar,  meat, hot dogs and seasoning.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita lives a simple life in a small town of Catigbian, Bohol. She is 48 years old and a mother of two boys; ages 26 and 11 years old. Her husband is a security guard while Lolita is engaged in hog raising business. She has been doing this for 11 years to earn a living. Thus, she is asking a loan to buy piglets and feed. Aside from this, she will also buy vaccines for them and able to have a healthy growth. In the future, Lolita wishes to improve her business to have better means of living.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feed and vaccines

loans.name: Kimsrim's Group

texts.en:
Kimsrim, who is a farmer from Kampong Cham province, is 33 years old and she is married. She is blessed with five children, four of whom are in school while the remaining one is too young to attend school. She and her husband grow jicama to earn main source of income. Moreover, they earn additional income by raising cows and horses and sometimes working as construction worker. 
Because Kimsrim is in need of working capital, she is now leading a two members group to apply for loan from VisionFund. As the group leader, she is going to use her loan to buy organic fertilizer to boost crop yields. She hopes that this purchase will let her crop grow well so that she can improve living condition and support her children’s studying.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to input on her jicama farming to boost crop yields which enable her to earn more income. .

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Ho's Group

texts.en:
A resident in Kampong Cham province, Ho is 62 years old and a married mother of five children, two of whom rely on her. To make a living, she and her husband grow wet season rice for main source of income. Growing chili pepper is the secondary business helping her earn additional income. Drought is the main challenge to rice farming business. 
Ho leads a two-member group to apply for loan from VisionFund to save business. As the group leader, she is going to use her loan to buy organic fertilizer and fuel for pumping machine. She hopes to earn more income to improve the standard of living.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to increase productivity of her crop yields so as to gain more returns. .

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Los Trabajadores Del Cantón Xiprian Group

texts.es:
Lucia es una gran mujer de 20 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Lucia para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la elaboración de bordados para trajes típicos, con esta actividad ella lleva 5 años de realizarlo, pero para mejorar sus ingresos trabaja entre días lavando ropa. 
Lucia para mejorar su calidad de producto para que sus clientes tengan donde escoger, ella se ha visto la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de hilos de tipo, seda, alemán y lustrina. Con esta inversión ella espera poder mejorar su bordado para que su clientela este muy satisfecha.
Su gran sueño es poder contar con un local propio donde poder exhibir mejor sus bordados típicos.
texts.en:
Lucia is a great woman of 20 years of age. She is single. She lives with her parents and siblings in a community of Chichicastenango.

Lucia, in order to obtain her income and move her family ahead, does embroidery for traditional dresses. She has been doing this work for five years, but to improve her income she works during the day washing clothes.

To improve the quality of her product so that her customers have more choices, Lucia has seen the need to apply for a loan to purchase silk thread, German embroidery thread, and embroidery floss. With this investment she hopes to be able to improve her embroidery so that her customers are very satisfied.

Her great dream is to be able to have her own shop where she can better display her traditional embroidery.

loans.use: to buy silk thread, German embroidery floss, and embroidery floss.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en: Five years ago, Milagros starts her own business. She sells “amakan” known as bamboo weaving. This “amakan” is use by some locals for their house walls and ceilings. Milagros has been doing this for five years to earn a living with help of her husband. Thus, she is asking a loan to buy bamboo that is used in making “amakan”. In the future, Milagros wants to improve this business for sustainability. She also wants to increase her earnings for her children. Thus, Milagros and her husband have a big family. They have eleven children; ten adults and one-school-aged child that still need their support.

loans.use: to buy bamboo for weaving.

loans.name: Norberto

texts.en:
Norberto is a 54-year-old married man and a father of three children from Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. He has been running a sari-sari or variety store business in his place for more than five years now. This is the source of his income as his wife work as a teacher.

Norberto is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, soft drinks, candies, soda, soap and toiletries. Norberto hopes that through this loan, he will be able to improve his store, increase his customers as well as his income.

loans.use: to  buy canned goods, soft drinks, candies, soda, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is 54 years old and operates a sari-sari (convenience) store in her community, which she has done for 25 years. She sells basic household commodities like detergent, seasonings, toiletries, chips, canned goods and soft drinks. In addition to this, she also helps the fishing business that is mostly managed by her husband.

Veronica is asking for a loan to buy more items to resell like bottled water, soft drinks, cooking oil, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, canned goods, diapers, coffee and biscuits. These items are in high demand and sell well on a daily basis. With a loan, Veronica is confident that her sari-sari business will be more prosperous. She can have the chance to buy items in bulk, thus minimizing her expense on transportation. This will in turn give her a better revenue.

loans.use: to buy bottled water, soft drinks, cooking oil, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, canned goods, diapers, coffee and biscuits

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a 50-year-old married woman with a 9-year-old daughter from Ormoc City, Leyte. She earns a living through her sari-sari store selling various goods and food items to her customers. Elisa has been in this business for more than three years now.

Elisa is a very hardworking woman and aside from her store, she also manages to juggle raising hogs. She is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell, such as vinegar, soy sauce, corn starch, sugar, milk, milo sachets, powdered detergent, coffee, matches, canned corned beef, beef loaves, sardines, creamer and shampoo.

This loan will enable Elisa to increase her inventory level, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, she hopes to make her business a sustainable one.

loans.use: to buy vinegar, soy sauce, corn starch, sugar, milk, milo sachets, powdered detergent, coffee, matches, canned corned beef, beef loaves, sardines, creamer and shampoo.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 45 años de edad, es soltero con una linda familia numerosa ellos viven en una comunidad del Caserío Monto Mercedes.  
Juan para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando una serie de verduras tales como papa y cebolla, él tiene 30 años de ejercer esta labor. Juan su mayor dificultad para incrementar su cultivo ha sido no contar con suficiente efectivo para solventar los gastos de su cultivo, por esa razón a decidido solicitar un préstamo para la compra de semillas de papa he insumos agrícolas para cultivar a tiempo y conseguir una buena cosecha al final del año. Su gran sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Juan is a 45-year-old man. He is single with a large, beautiful family. They live in the community of Caserío Monto Mercedes.

In order to earn his income and get his family ahead, Juan earns a living in agriculture, cultivating a series of vegetables such as potatoes and onions. He has 30 years of practice in this work.

Juan´s greatest difficulty in boosting his crops has been not having enough cash to cover his cultivation costs. For that reason, he has decided to request a loan in order to buy potato seeds and agricultural products in order to grow on time and get a better harvest at the end of the year.

His greatest dream is to improve his family´s quality of life and improve his house.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Sonia Margarita

texts.es: Sonia es una mujer trabajadora que a sus 46 años de edad muestra su empeño cada día en su negocio, ya que desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de platos típicos, lo cual le permite sacar adelante a su familia. Sonia vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace  10 años en compañía de su nieta de 10 años de edad y  su madre a la que apoya en su vejez. Sonia desea invertir en más productos para su negocio, ya que gracias a él excelente sabor de sus productos cada día cuenta con más clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en ingredientes para elaborar: papas fritas, pasteles de carne, enchiladas entre otros platillos.
texts.en:
Sonia is a hardworking woman who, at 46 years of age, shows her commitment every day to her business.  For the past two years she has worked selling typical dishes, which allows her to get her family ahead.  Sonia lives in her own house, and for the past ten years in the company of her granddaughter who is 10 years old and Sonia's mother, whom she supports in her old age.

Sonia wants to invest in more products for her business since, thanks to the excellent flavor of her products, each day she has more customers who ask for her products.  That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in ingredients to make french fries, meat pies, enchiladas, among other dishes.

loans.use: To invest in ingredients to make french fries, meat pies, enchiladas, among other dishes.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a retailer in Matag-ob, Leyte. She has been in business for 15 years due to her hard work and dedication. She perseveres to provide for the needs of her family, and is determined to give her six children a good life. Her kids are between the ages of seven to seventeen.

Rosalina is requesting a loan to buy sachets of Milo, milk, sugar, toothpaste, hair conditioner, canned food and biscuits. She hopes to have a prosperous life through her business.

loans.use: to buy sachets of Milo, milk, sugar, toothpaste, hair conditioner, canned food and biscuits.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una señora de 39 años de edad es casada, trabaja como empleada de mostrador. Necesita someterse a una cirugía para extirpar un tejido que presenta en la esclerótica del ojo y esta invadiendo la cornea, decidió atenderse  por que ya presenta problemas de visión. Actualmente lleva un tratamiento con gotas pero esto lo únicos que le provoca es es que su ojo este mas rojo y el tejido crezca mas rápido por lo que necesita someterse a la cirugía.
texts.en: She's a 39-year-old married woman who's employed in retail.  She needs surgery to remove some tissue in the white of her eye that's invading her cornea.  She decided to get help because she has vision problems now.  Currently she's undergoing treatment with drops, but it only makes her eye redder and the eye tissue grow more quickly, so she needs the surgery.

loans.use: to pay for eye treatment

loans.name: Abner Manuel

texts.es:
Abner es un joven de 20 años de edad, es soltero vive junto  a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad de Chichicastenango.
Abner para generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la agricultura sembrando una variedad de verduras de su región, el lleva 10 años de realizar este tipo de actividad, pues empezó desde muy pequeño.
Abner a considerado necesario solicitar un préstamo para a la compra  de semillas de arveja china y fertilizantes, pues esta verdura es una de las que obtiene mucha demanda en la época de fin de año y lo que él quiere es aprovechar esta oportunidad. Su gran sueño es fortalecer su cultivo y mejorar las condiciones de vida de mi familia.
texts.en:
Abner is a young 20-year-old man, he is single, and lives with his parents and brothers in a community in Chichicastenango.

In order to generate an income and get his family ahead in life, Abner makes a living in agriculture by growing a variety of vegetables from his region. For 10 years he has done this work, since he started it when he was very young.

Abner found it necessary to request a loan in order to buy snow pea seeds and fertilizer, because this vegetable is one that gets much demand at the end of the year and he wants to take advantage of this opportunity. His great dream is to strengthen his crop and to improve the living conditions of my family.

loans.use: to buy snow pea seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es una gran mujer de 29 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus 4  hijos en una comunidad del caserío el oratorio. Juana para sacar adelante a sus amada familia trabaja como comerciante y agricultora, con estas dos actividades lleva 15 años de realizarlo pues lo heredo de sus padres. Juana con el afán de poder cultivar en esta temporada ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para la compra  de semillas de ejote  y abono orgánico, esto con el fin de cultivar a tiempo y cosechar en este fin de año, para aprovechar la época. Juana tiene el anhelo de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en:
Juana is a great woman of 29 years of age. She is single and lives with her four children in a community of the hamlet El Oratorio. To raise her beloved family, she works as a merchant and as a farmer. She has been working in these two activities for 15 years, since she inherited them from her parents.

Juana, with the goal of being able to plant a crop in this season, has decided to apply for a loan to purchase seeds for green beans and organic compost, with the goal of planting on time and harvesting at the end of the year, in order to take advantage of the season. Juana has the goal of improving the conditions of her house so that her family can live better.

loans.use: to buy seeds for green beans and organic compost.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una señora casada que tiene problemas en su dentadura, necesita un tratamiento de ortodoncia debido a que sus piezas dentales se encuentran desalineadas, lo que le provoca alteración en la mandíbula y sangrado en las encías, ademas del evidente problema estético que le causa baja autoestima, ya que su trabajo es de atención al público.
texts.en: She's a married woman with dental problems.  She needs an orthodontic treatment because her teeth are uneven, which causes jaw pain and bleeding gums as well as the obvious aesthetic issue that affects her self-esteem, because she works in public service.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo es un hombre que a sus 63 años de edad vive con su esposa en su vivienda muy humilde desde hace 30 años. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como agricultor de hortalizas, actividad que le permite salir adelante junto a su esposa que siempre busca la manera de brindarle su apoyo. Lorenzo desea terminar de construir su vivienda, ya que en la que vive actualmente es una champita de láminas deterioradas, por lo que desea terminar la vivienda que se observa en la fotografía, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina, madera, clavos, cemento, arena y grava para terminar de construir su vivienda y tener un lugar más seguro.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is a 63 year old man who has lived in a humble home with his wife for 30 years. He is a hard working man who makes a living as a growing vegetables, activity that allows him to make a living and get ahead with his wife who is always very supportive.
Lorenzo wants to finish building his house because he currently lives ina shack in very deteriorated conditions. He wishes to finish the house shown in the picture. He's requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in sheets, wood, nails, cement, sand, and gravel to finish building his home and have a safer place to live.

loans.use: to invest in sheets, wood, nails, cement, sand, and gravel to finish building his home and have a safer place to live.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene has been a fish vendor for six years now. She sells fresh fish to the locals in her community. Aside from selling fish, she also sells frozen goods to augment her income.

Arlene is a 43-year-old married woman with two children. She lives in her own home with her husband and children in the rural town of Dumanjug, Cebu.

Arlene wants to purchase additional stock of fish, frozen goods and piglets, which is why she is requesting a loan from CEVI to boost her livelihood. In this way, she can provide for her customers' needs and start to settle her obligation.

Arlene is determined to someday, with your support, become successful in her business and be able to support the welfare of her family, too.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fish, frozen goods and piglets.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita has been cultivating the land, growing and selling rice for 15 years to earn a living. She is married with five grown children, and resides in Trinidad, Bohol.

Margarita requested a loan to buy farm supplies, such as rice seedlings and fertilizers. These are essential tools that will generate more yield and augment her income, enabling her to provide nutritious diets for herself and her husband. She is determined to expand her farming and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
La Sra. Blanca es separada, y tiene hijos ya todos grandes y universitarios , que con mucho sacrificio pudo sacar adelante, ella se dedica a la compra y ventas de ropas, calzados deportivos elaboración y ventas de comestibles, como se ve es una persona muy sacrificada y luchadora que se esfuerza por sus seres queridos.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar ropas en variedad y calzados, de manera a poder tener un buen stock y poder dar a sus clientes una buena variedad. Sueña con  ampliar su negocio  y  dar fuente de trabajo a las personas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Blanca is separated and has grown chidlren in university, which she was able to get ahead with a lot of sacrifice. She buys and sells clothes, sport shoes, and makes and sells food. She sacrifices and works hard for her loved ones.
She's requesting a loan to buy a variety of clothes and shoes to keep a good stock and offer a good variety of items to her clients. She dreams of expanding her business and be able to provide job opportunities to other people.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes and shoes for sale.

loans.name: Py Renda Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Py Renda esté en su ciclo 20, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, todas ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras que quieren salir adelante y por medio de su trabajo unido mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Diosma quien vende prendas de todo tipo, comenta que tiene muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella, que ya es muy conocida en la zona y que por ello le está yendo muy bien. Diosma es una persona muy entusiasta que participa siempre de una manera activa dentro del comité.
La Sra. Diosma solicita de este préstamo para la compra de  como Pantalones, remeras, jeans, camisas, polleras  y otros  lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Py Renda is in its 20th cycle.  They are in the program of eliminating poverty.  All of them are very hardworking women who want to get ahead, and through their united work, improve the living conditions of their loved ones.

One of the members is la señora Diosma who works selling clothing of all kinds.  She says that she has a very good clientele who always buy from her since she is very well know in the area, and because of that she is doing very well.  Diosma is a very enthusiastic person who always participates actively in the committee.  

La señora Diosma is requesting this loan to buy clothing such as pants, t-shirts, jeans, shirts, skirts, and other clothing which will help her at the same time to have more production and more sales which will help her increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy pants, t- shirts, jeans, shirts, skirts, and other clothing.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.es:
La señora Leonida es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, tiene una hija, está casada con el señor Gerónimo, con quien tiene un negocio ventas de productos de primera necesidad. 
Comenta que anteriormente junto con su marido se dedicaba a la agricultura, pero que fueron creciendo gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio de ambos, son una pareja muy trabajadora y sacrificada.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio, tales como azúcar, fideos, harina, arroz, sal, poroto, carne, queso, leche entre otros, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Leonida is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. She has a daughter and is married to Mr. Geronimo with whom she has a business selling first need items. In the past her husband worked in agriculture but with effort and sacrifice they kept growing the business. There are a hard working and sacrificed couple.
She's requesting the loan to buy items for her business like sugar, flour, noodles, rice, salt, beans, beef, cheese, milk, among other products. She's grateful for the opportunity given to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy items for her business like sugar, flour, noodles, rice, salt, beans, beef, cheese, milk, among other products.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El comité se denomina Kuña Katupyry, conformada por 15  integrantes, se encuentran en el segundo ciclo; todas con muy buenas expectativas sobre las actividades que están llevando a cabo, cada una tiene sus metas propias para lograr mejorar la situación de vida de sus familias.
La Sra. Mariana es la presidenta de este comité es muy trabaja y se destaca en ella el espíritu emprendedor, anteriormente se desempeñaba como ama de casa y con la cría de animales, pero gracias a las microfranquicias que ofrece la fundación paraguaya, le gustó la idea de preparar y vender productos de limpieza, y se animó a emprender esta nueva actividad y ahora se encuentra trabajando también en ello.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar la microfranquicias de productos de limpieza que ofrece la fundación paraguaya, y de esa forma poder seguir con la preparación y venta de los mismos.
texts.en:
The committee known as Kuña Katupyry is made up of 15 members. This is their second cycle. They all have very good expectations about the activities they are carrying out, each of them with their own goals to improve the quality of life of their families.
Mrs. Mariana is the president of the committee and she's a hard worker who stands out for her entrepreneurial spirit. Previously she worked as a house keeper and breeding animals. Thanks to the small business opportuinities provided by Fundacion Paraguaya she got the idea of preparing and selling cleaning products so she started with this activity.
She's requesting a loan to buy the small business offers from Fundacion Paraguaya for cleaning products and in that way continue with their preparation and sale.

loans.use: to buy microfranchises of cleaning products to make other cleaning products.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Kuña Guapa está en su ciclo 11 del programa de comité de mujeres, con 17  integrantes de las cuales todas trabajan en variadas actividades, cada una de ella pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder capacitarse y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Sonia, quien vende ropas variadas, y gracias a ese trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella es una mujer muy sacrificada, día a día empieza su trabajo desde muy temprano en la mañana y pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder capacitarse y mejorar su emprendimiento. 
Sonia pide este préstamo para poder surtirse con una mayor variedad de productos, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones, jeans, camisas y otros, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que tanto ella como sus compañeras están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Guapa is in its 11 cycle of the program of the committee of women.  With 17 members who all work in various jobs, each one of them puts forth her best effort to be able to train and to improve their living conditions and that of their loved ones.

One of the members is la señora Sonia who sells various clothing, and thanks to that job, she has the means to be able to help her family and her loved ones.  She is a very sacrificing woman.  Everyday she starts her job very early in the morning and gives her best effort to be able to train and improve her business.

Sonia is requesting this loan to be able to stock herself with a wider variety of products such as t-shrits, shirts, pants, jeans, and other clothing, and in this way be able to continue her sales as she has been doing.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she as well as her partners are receiving.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell such as t-shirts, shirts, pants, jeans, and other clothing.

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.en:
Marcelo has been a rice farmer for 28 years. He is 48 years old and is from San Miguel, Bohol.

The previous harvest season has been good to him, and so he is looking forward to a better income this time around. He applied for a loan due to limited money at hand.

He will use the money for fertilizer to enhance his yield. The additional income will go to his twelve-year-old dependent and the family's daily consumption.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Nila

texts.en:
Nila is from Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. She is a married woman blessed with two children aged 18 and 19. Nila's husband works in construction with his carpentry skills. Nila also helps him by selling dried fish, hot dogs and longganisa (cured, sweet pork sausage). This business has been thriving for five years, allowing her to earn PHP 2,000 per month. She is asking a loan to buy stocks of dried fish, hot dogs and longganisa. 

Nila plans to save enough so that someday she can start a restaurant business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish, hot dogs and longganisa.

loans.name: Erika Beatriz

texts.es: Erika es una mujer de 22 años de edad que cada día pone su empeño para la elaboración de sus productos, ya que desde hace 5 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de diferentes atoles, lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia. Erika vive desde hace varios años en vivienda propia junto a su hijo de 1 años de edad, madre y sus hermanos a los que apoya económicamente. Erika desea invertir en su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: maíz, harina, hojuelas de cereal, leche, canela, etc., para elaborar atoles.
texts.en:
Erika is a 22-year-old woman who makes an effort every day to prepare her products, because for five years she has dedicated herself to making and selling different atoles [corn-based drinks], which allows her to get her family ahead in life.

For several years Erika has lived in her own house along with her one-year-old son, mother, and her brothers whom she supports financially. Erika wishes to invest in her business, which is why she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in corn, flour, corn flakes, milk, cinnamon, etc., in order to prepare atoles [corn-based drinks].

loans.use: to invest in corn, flour, corn flakes, milk, cinnamon, etc., in order to make atoles [corn-based drinks].

loans.name: Rincon Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre Rincon está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comités, es un grupo nuevo que tiene las mejores expectativas de poder capacitarse y mejorar su vida, ellas también están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por poder crecer.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cynthia, una humilde vendedora de ropa, es una mujer muy trabajadora que a través de su humilde trabajo, se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Ella ayuda a su familia por medio de su trabajo, y de esa manera tiene los medios para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos. Cynthia participa siempre de una manera activa en las capacitaciones que les ofrece la fundación paraguaya.
La Sra. Cynthia pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas varadas, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas, quiere comprar remeras, camisas, jeans, pantalones y otros, esta agradecida por la oportunidad de poder crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
This group is named “Rincon.” It is in its first cycle in the committees program. It is a new group, which has the greatest expectations of being able to train themselves and improve their lives. They are also part of the poverty elimination program, fighting to be able to grow.

One of the members is Cynthia, a humble clothing seller. She is a very hard-working woman who, by means of her humble work, earns a living in a decent and honest way. She helps her family through her work, and in this way, she has the means to be able to help her loved ones. Cynthia always participates actively in the trainings offered by the Paraguayan foundation.

Cynthia is requesting this loan to be able to buy various garments. In this way she will able to continue her sales. She wants to buy t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, and others. She is grateful for the opportunity to be able to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, and other garments to sell.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre San Cayetano está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, se fijaron como meta poder crecer no solo en lo económico, sino también como persona. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 4 se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en una pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Noelia quien se dedica en la venta de Verduras y Frutas, también se debe destacar el trabajo unido de todas, donde ponen su mayor esfuerzo para poder crecer y salir adelante. Noelia comenta que por medio de su esfuerzo ayuda a su familia y les da lo que necesitan para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
La Sra. Noelia pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas y verduras frescas de manera a poder tener una mayor variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called San Cayentona is in its 4th cycle of the program of committee of women, where all work and help each other to get ahead.  They set a goal to be able to grow, not only economically, but also as a person.  They are part of the program to eliminate poverty, where four of them find themselves below the line of poverty, that is to say an extreme poverty.

One of the members is la señora Noelia who works selling fruits and vegetables.  Also, one should highlight the united work of all of them, where they put forth their best effort to be able to grow and get ahead.  Noelia say that through her hard work, she helps her family and she gives them what they need to be able to improve her living conditions and those of her loved ones.

La señora Noelia is requesting this loan to be able to buy fresh fruits and vegetables to be able to have a wider variety to offer to her customers.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she receives to be able to improve her living conditions and those of her loved ones.

loans.use: To buy fresh fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda hails from San Miguel, a town in Bohol, with limited options for livelihood. She is 49 years old and has been farming rice for five years.

Luzviminda is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farm and to help pay for her child's placement fee for going abroad. Going abroad is one way for her family to have a good life so she gives it her all to support it. She wanted to increase her income for her family’s benefit and prosperity.

Her harvest will be sold for income and will also cover for their daily needs for food.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for her child's placement fee
